description: Template configuration for this project. See https://www.codebuff.com/config for all options.

fileChangeHooks.name: backend-unit-tests
fileChangeHooks.command: set -o pipefail && bun test $(find src -name *.test.ts ! -name *.integration.test.ts) 2>&1 | grep -Ev $'\x1b\[[0-9;]*m' | grep -Ev '^s*[0-9]+s+(pass|skip)|(pass)|(skip)' && bun run typecheck-only
